Package com.example.pokemonqrcode

Class ScannedCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.pokemonqrcode.ScannedCode
  • public class ScannedCode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the result of a scanned code, will be used to handle the methods responsible for scoring, name, image
